args: Please note that this story contains spoilers\nfor Chapter 19 of the main campaign and for\nLaxi's adventurer story.
Woof, the forest of the faeries is huge.\nWe've been walking for ages and we\nSTILL haven't made it to the Sacred Tree.
The tree stands at the heart of the forest,\nafter all. It's easily a few days' trip.
I see. Then we'd best pace ourselves\naccordingly.
Come, {player_name}.\nWe'll establish camp here for the night.
All right. Let's try to finish setting things\nup before it grows too dark.
Hey, Laxi. Let's you and me go gather\nsome firewood.
Heh heh. I'd be happy to join you in her\nplace, Luca.
Chelle was kind enough to furnish me with\nthis body. The least I can do is put it to\ngood use.
'Preciate it, Mascula. But, uh... Are you\nokay? Being apart from Laxi, I mean.
You're piloting that body remotely from\ninside her, if I recall.
That's correct, yes. The thought-circuits\nthat form my heart are still inside Laxi's\nframe.
I can operate anywhere within broadcast\nrange of the control signal she emanates.
Meaning...you won't be able to move if\nyou get too far from her?
Correct. It varies depending on the terrain,\nbut the dense vegetation here interferes\nwith the signal, limiting my range.
That's why I'm busy trying to talk her into\ncoming back right now. But, well...
Denied. Doing it alone is more efficient\nand means no one gets lost.\nLuca is unnecessary.
▷You're always so resistant to the\nidea of teamwork, Laxi...◁
Untrue. I am simply being efficient.
*sigh* It's no use. She's not having it.
Aha ha ha... Still, that's pretty wild. You're\nhere talking to me and having a chat with\nLaxi out there at the same time.
Ooh, I know! If she's gonna be stubborn\nabout it, why don't we play a little trick\non her with this?
You're suggesting we deliberately do\nsomething Laxi will dislike in order to\nenjoy her negative reaction? Is that right?
That strikes me as an ill-conceived plan at\nbest.
Aw, don't be like that. If it works,\nshe might come back!
C'mooon, it'll be great! So, here's the plan.\n*whisper* *whisper*
Huh... All right... I see... We WHAT?!\nHm... Hmmm... Are you certain?
Firewood gathering complete.\nI knew it would be more efficient without\nLuca's antics.
What? Luca is what?\n▷Well, he's... Uhhh...◁
▷He's doing a headstand while battling a\nfiend. He's trapped its head between his\nlegs while juggling his bow and arrows!◁
▷You're, uh...not feeling curious? I feel\nlike this is a fairly unusual scene. Don't\nyou want to see it for yourself?◁
Pfft, ha ha ha! Classic. So, what's the\nsitch? She dying of curiosity? I bet\nshe's sprinting back at full tilt.
...Oh. Oh, this is not good. Laxi is sprinting\nin the opposi...irection...signal...king up...
Whoa! You all right, Mascula? Is this what\ngoing outside of signal range looks like?
Don't tell ridiculous lies.\n▷I said I was sorry, Laxi, so please!\nCome back!◁
Gwah ha ha ha! So THAT's why you guys\ntook so long getting wood?
Ha ha... Those two do love to squabble,\nLaxi and Mascula.
That they do. Though this time, I think\nit safe to say the blame lies with Luca's\nstupid prank.
Oh, come ON! It's Laxi's fault for charging\noff in the first place!
Luca chatters needlessly and insists on\nmission-irrelevant detours.
All right, settle down.\nLuca, Laxi, time for dinner.
Ugh, fine. I was getting hungry anyway.
And what's gotten into you, Mascula?\nYou go on and eat as well.
Oh, yes. Apologies. It just felt so nostalgic,\nI couldn't help but laugh.
Dining with you in my own body.\nIt's been so long, you know?
Ah, I suppose it has. Sharing a body with\nLaxi rendered you unable to enjoy the\npleasure of eating firsthand, didn't it?
Yes. Which is why I'm so delighted now.
Being able to walk alongside you all on\nmy own two legs again is nothing short\nof a dream.
Heh. Feeling's mutual, buddy! I'm happy to\nhave you back at the table with us, too.
Agreed. I'm pleased as well.\nNow I don't have to share vocal circuits\nwith Mascula.
Tch. If you're going to be like that...
▷I'm happy to keep talking out of this\nbody instead.◁
No. You have your own body now.\nFrom now on, only talk from there.
▷Nope. If the need arises, I'm still using\nyour vocal circuits!◁
I never quite get used to the sight of it—\nthe way Mascula bounces back and forth,\nspeaking out of two different bodies.
Agreed. It's an entertaining spectacle.\nThey're limited in range, but that link may\nbe of use relaying intel on the battlefield.
That's true. Their link could allow us to\ncoordinate two squads working in tandem.\nThat could be extremely useful.
You don't say! I'd be thrilled to be of use\nto our maestro. If the need ever arises,\nplease don't hesitate to ask!
You're very kind to offer. I'm sure we'll be\nrelying on the both of you, Mascula.
For sure! It feels weird to say it this late,\nbut it's great to have you aboard!
Heh heh... Thank you! And likewise,\nI'm eager to fight alongside you all!
What's got you all quiet, Laxi?\nYou pouting again?
(So Mascula will fight with them.\nAutonomously, in that body...)
